N = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))

l.sort()

if l[0] + l[1] > l[-1]:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))

if max(l) < sum(l) - max(l):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))
s = sum(l)
if max(l) < s-max(l):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

N = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split())) # 入力を数値に変換してリストにする

L.sort()

if L[0] + L[1] > L[-1]: # 三角形の成立条件
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

for i in range(len(arr)):

        print(arr[i], i)

N = int(input())

L.sort()

if L[0] + L[1] > L[-1]:
    print("Yes")
else:

n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))

if max(l) < sum(l) - max(l):
    print("Yes")

N = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

L.sort()

if L[0] + L[1] > L[-1] and L[0] + L[2] > L[-1] and L[1] + L[2] > L[-1]:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]

if max(l) < sum(l)-max(l):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
